Looking for a Kia Sorento near Washington?

The Kia Sorento competes in an extremely crowded segment against other mid-sized SUVs. Luckily for Kia, the Sorento stands out with bold styling and a bevy of options, making it an extremely versatile competitor. With the largest selection of cars from dealers and private sellers, Autotrader can help find the perfect Sorento for you.

Autotrader has 101 Kia Sorentos for sale near Washington, DC, including a Used 2006 Kia Sorento 2WD, a Used 2006 Kia Sorento 2WD LX, and a Used 2006 Kia Sorento 4WD.

Not sure if a Sorento is the right fit for you?

That's okay! We make it easy to shop for your next vehicle by body type, mileage, price, and much more.You can find other popular Kia vehicles such as Niro, Forte, and Telluride on Autotrader.
